creator: Dave@JungleMoss.com
text:
It would be nice if the Windows Apache Service Monitor could view and control 
Tomcat services. It would be good if this change was available before Tomcat 5 
is released as final.

Created attachment 8312
Here is a patch to allow Apache Service Monitor to control Tomcat services
creator: Dave@JungleMoss.com

text:
enabling the PatchAvailable keyword
updated doc on submitting patches is at http://httpd.apache.org/dev/patches.html
creator: trawick@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 22722
New version of the patch

Patch against Apache 2.2.9.
creator: dave@daveoxley.co.uk

text: It has been a very long time since this enhancement was first requested, and also since the patch was first released. This functionality is still not part of the service monitor as of HTTPD 2.2.17. It would be nice to see this feature added permanently. :-)
creator: jason.cipriani@gmail.com
